mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO coupon_tb ( code, name, img_address, discount, content, create_date, update_date, start_date, end_date, status, mer_cate_id, account_id, coupon_term_id ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{name}, #{imgAddress}, #{discount}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{merCateId}, #{accountId}, #{couponTermId} )

img_address=#{imgAddress},
